snippet.title: Let Him Cook - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2570710/Let_Him_Cook/

Let Him Cook is a top-down action survivor roguelike where you play as a food industry professional fighting living food puns and trying to survive. When food fights back, you gotta cook and suit up with culinary weaponry like the brutal Rolling Pin, Splendiferous Spatula, or even……a Whisk! Hire a team of assistants to help you overcome this kitchen battlefield and synergize with your loadout. Survive and find yourself face-to-face with an over-the-top bullet hell boss!

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/VmhJ4QcESe
Twitter: https://twitter.com/H_F_Studios
